alert.note: Alert for Berks; Bucks; Chester; Lehigh; Montgomery (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 1:03PM EDT until July 25 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Berks County in eastern Pennsylvania... South central Lehigh County in eastern Pennsylvania... Northwestern Montgomery County in southeastern Pennsylvania... West central Bucks County in southeastern Pennsylvania... Northeastern Chester County in southeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 145 PM EDT. * At 103 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pughtown, or 15 miles north of West Chester, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Pottstown, Phoenixville, Perkasie, Souderton, Collegeville, Royersford, Trappe, East Greenville, Schwenksville, Bally, Green Lane, Pughtown, Spring Mount, Geryville, Gilbertsville, Cedarville, Skippack, Stowe, Telford and Sellersville. This includes Northeast Extension between mile markers 31 and 42. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
